channel.title: Steam Sales
channel.description:
Was thinking this may be a good topic to make. Whenever a good steam/GMG sale comes on board somebody should be nice and post about it. This weekend you can get both Batman Arkaham city and Asylum for only like $12-13 combined price! This is really a sweet deal as one of them is normally about $20 and the other about $30.
Already purchased mine :)

item.title: Steam Sales
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:2, topic:534255”]http://www.steamgamesales.com/ or http://www.reddit.com/r/steamdeals[/quote]Thanks Justin ( already knew about first one )

This is a topic purely for the lazy people/those who may not be aware of finding out in other ways.

Read full topic
